get/amenities: SELECT am.id, am.name, cat.name AS category FROM amenities AS am INNER JOIN categories AS cat ON am.category_id = cat.id
get/amenities/rental: SELECT am.id, am.name, cat.name AS category FROM amenities_rental AS am_re INNER JOIN amenities AS am ON am_re.amenity_id = am.id INNER JOIN categories AS cat ON am.category_id = cat.id WHERE am_re.rental_id =
get/rental: SELECT re.*, ad.latitude, ad.longitude, ad.zipcode, ad.street, ad.number, ci.name AS city_name, st.name AS state_name, st.short, CEILING(COUNT(*) OVER() / 20) AS page_count FROM rental AS re INNER JOIN address AS ad ON re.address_id = ad.id INNER JOIN cities AS ci ON ad.city_id = ci.id INNER JOIN states AS st ON ci.state_id = st.id ORDER BY re.id LIMIT 20 OFFSET
get/rental?numerics: SELECT re.*, ad.latitude, ad.longitude, ad.zipcode, ad.street, ad.number, ci.name AS city_name, st.name AS state_name, st.short, CEILING(COUNT(*) OVER() / 20) AS page_count FROM rental AS re INNER JOIN address AS ad ON re.address_id = ad.id INNER JOIN cities AS ci ON ad.city_id = ci.id INNER JOIN states AS st ON ci.state_id = st.id WHERE re.rent BETWEEN ? AND ? AND re.area BETWEEN ? AND ? AND re.bathrooms ? ? AND re.rooms ? ? AND re.parking_spaces ? ? ORDER BY re.id LIMIT 20 OFFSET ?
